GJMR Quartet

Bringing classical music to the 21st century

We are a world-renowned quartet with over over 40 years collective experience playing in major concert halls, performing in weddings & intimate private function, and delivering rigourous masterclasses!

Book us today!

A beautiful, fully realised sound from the most exciting up-and-coming quartet playing today. They bbreathed new life into Schubert's Death of a Maiden...I've already got my ticket to see them again!

Dana Yickers,
Gramophone

[GJMR Quartet] made my wedding so special to me and my husband, and I highly recommend you hire them. Walking down the aisle as they played will forever be etched into my memory.

James MacLeod

A stricking and haunting rendition of Bartok's 6th quartet. Every instrument played their part to put on a highly memorable concert!

Ally Sunavant,
Classic FM

The GJMR Quartet created a magical world where every note was played to such a high standard, I forgot I was in a concert hall. The stand-out quartet of the new generation.

Bob Lope,
BBC Music
